NK100(the)007:1: // rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag nod par 'dod pa rnams kyis dabu'o //
NK100(the)007:2: rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag nod par 'dod pa rnams kyis /
NK100(the)007:3: sngon du bla ma la yon phul te mnyes par byas la /
NK100(the)007:4: tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
NK100(the)007:5: slob dpon sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK100(the)007:6: thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas /
NK100(the)007:8: skye rgas na 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis //
NK100(the)007:9: yun rings dus nas nyon mongs na //
NK100(the)007:10: de las thar par bya ba'i phyir //
NK100(the)007:11: byang chub gzhan nas mi tshol ba'i //
NK100(the)007:12: bdag ni gnyis med nod par 'tshal //
NK100(the)007:13: zhes len gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
NK100(the)007:14: de nas bla mas kyang rdzogs pa chen po chen po gnyis su med pa 'di /
NK100(the)007:15: 'ju sa che chung la g.yangs sa che /
NK100(the)007:16: dus deng sang gi spyod yul ma yin pas /
NK100(the)007:17: nyan thos 'dul ba'i chos khrus dang gtsang sbra dang /
NK100(the)007:18: dka' thub dang sdom pas gdams ngag bden pa bzhi la dmigs nas /
NK100(the)007:19: 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i thabs yod pas de rgyud la long zhig ces basgo'o //
NK100(the)007:20: de nas yang slob mas phyag btsal te /
NK100(the)007:21: bla ma chen po bdag la dgongs /
NK100(the)007:22: nyan thos dag gis sde snod de /
NK100(the)007:23: thabs dang shes rab bul gyur bas /
NK100(the)007:24: bdag gzhan don ni nus ma yin //
NK100(the)007:25: thugs rje dang bral dbyings na nyal //
NK100(the)007:26: shes rab dang bral dngos por 'dzin //
NK100(the)007:27: de la bdag ni mi spro yis //
NK100(the)007:28: de ring gnyis med bstan du gsol //
NK100(the)007:30: yang bla mas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
NK100(the)007:31: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhes bya ba /
NK100(the)007:32: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa lta bas zin par byas te /
NK100(the)007:33: skal pa grangs med par spyad de 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i thabs dam pa /
NK100(the)007:34: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa byed nus par 'gyur pa'i theg pa yod kyis /
NK100(the)007:35: de rgyud la long zhig ces brjod la /
NK100(the)007:36: byang chub sems dpa'i 'jug sgo la sogs pa bshad do //
NK100(the)007:37: de nas yang phyag btsal te /
NK100(the)007:38: bskal pa bye ba mang po ru //
NK100(the)007:39: sangs rgyas nam zhig 'byung pa la //
NK100(the)007:40: pha rol phyin pa'i sgor zhugs nas //
NK100(the)007:41: grangs med pa ru spyod pa de //
NK100(the)007:42: tshe ring nad med phun 'tshogs pas //
NK100(the)007:43: khrims dang sdom pa la gnas pa'i //
NK100(the)007:44: yul du byang chub bsgrub dgos na //
NK100(the)007:45: da lta tshe thung nad mang pas //
NK100(the)007:46: rtsol sgrub dka' thub bcas pa'i //
NK100(the)007:47: byang chub rnyed par mi 'gyur pas //
NK100(the)007:48: bla ma chen po khyod la ni //
NK100(the)007:49: de ring gnyen med nod par 'tshal //
NK100(the)007:51: yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces bsgo ste /
NK100(the)007:52: phyi pa thub pa rgyud kri ya dang yo ga la sogs pa /
NK100(the)007:53: sangs rgyas kyi sku da lta nyid du bsgom pa /
NK100(the)007:54: khrus dang gtsang sbra dang dka' thub dang sdom pa la rten nas /
NK100(the)007:55: byang chub bsgrub pa'i thabs dam pa yod pas der bzhugs la nyams su longs shig /ces so //
NK100(the)007:57: de nas slob mas phyag btsal te /
NK100(the)007:59: kri ya'i theg pa la sogs pa gsang sngags kyi chos lags na yang /
NK100(the)007:60: mtshan ma'i rtsol bsgrub shas che bas /
NK100(the)007:61: kri ya yo ga'i theg pa sogs kyang //
NK100(the)007:62: rtogs pa'i lta la dmigs ma bde' //
NK100(the)007:63: 'jug pa'i thabs la sgo mi yangs //
NK100(the)007:65: kri ya la sogs theg pa de //
NK100(the)007:66: sangs rgyas 'byung par dka' bas na //
NK100(the)007:67: dmigs rgyu'i chu la rnyeg pa bzhin //
NK100(the)007:68: 'bras bu rnyed par dka' bas na //
NK100(the)007:69: da lta tshe thung nad mang pas //
NK100(the)007:70: rtogs pa'i lta la dmigs bde ba //
NK100(the)007:71: 'bras bu gzhan nas mi tshol ba'i //
NK100(the)007:72: sgo yangs gnyis med theg pa de //
NK100(the)007:73: bla ma khyed kyis bstan du gsol //
NK100(the)007:74: 'jig rten bde' bsgrub bdag ma legs //
NK100(the)007:75: gzhan gyi don du bdag bsgrub pa //
NK100(the)007:76: bdag gi mgon cig khyed kyis mdzod //
NK100(the)007:78: de de yang bla mas 'di skad brjod do //
NK100(the)007:79: byang chub gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i thabs dam pa /
NK100(the)007:80: sangs rgyas yin pa la yin par shes nas /
NK100(the)007:81: yo ga man chad kyi dka' thub dang brtul zhugs dang bral nas /
NK100(the)007:82: ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum la sogs pa la blo sbyangs te /
NK100(the)007:83: sku dang ye shes 'byung par byed pa'i theg pa ma h+aa yo ga dang /
NK100(the)007:84: a nu yo ga lta ba la dmigs bde ste /
NK100(the)007:85: 'jug pa'i sgo yangs pa la sogs pa'i thabs dang ldan pas /
NK100(the)007:86: rtsang rme dang bzang ngan la sogs pa'i dam rdzas bdud rtsi chen por byin gyis brlabs te /
NK100(the)007:87: nyams pa'i nyid du byas blang dor med par byas nas /
NK100(the)007:88: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig gzhung bzhin du bsrungs nas /
NK100(the)007:89: 'bras bu sku gsum gyis grub pa'i theg pa de /
NK100(the)007:90: rgyud la nyams su longs shig ces basgo'o //
NK100(the)007:91: de nas yang slob mas phyag gsum btsal te /
NK100(the)007:92: de yang dam yang dam tshig bsgrub pa dang /
NK100(the)007:93: brtul zhugs la sogs pa mtshan ma'i la rtsol bsgrub shas che bas /
NK100(the)007:94: shin tu yang bsgrub pa nyams su blang dka' bar yang snang /
NK100(the)007:97: a dang par ni rnam ldan na zhes pa nas /
NK100(the)007:98: zhi bas de nyid mthong pa men zhes pa'i bar du brjod do //
NK100(the)007:99: yang slob mas 'di skad brjod de /
NK100(the)007:100: bdag dang sangs rgyas ye nas dbyer med kyang //
NK100(the)007:101: bdag ni 'khrul rtog bdag 'dzin nyams pa'i sa //
NK100(the)007:102: thog ma med nas ma rig mun par chud //
NK100(the)007:103: gnyis med chos sku mtshan ma'i nang du gtong //
NK100(the)007:104: nyon mongs la sogs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis //
NK100(the)007:105: nyam nga 'khor ba'i gnas cig pu 'khyams //
NK100(the)007:106: grogs dang mgon bgyid su yang ma mchis pas //
NK100(the)007:107: nam mkha' bzhin du kun la thugs snyoms pa'i //
NK100(the)007:108: thugs rje ldan pa'i bla ma khyed kyis su //
NK100(the)007:109: ye shes spyi blugs dbang mchog di ring rtsol //
NK100(the)007:110: rigs pa rang gsal dbang mchog di ring rtsol //
NK100(the)007:111: rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang mchog di ring rtsool //
NK100(the)007:112: de nas yang bla mas 'di skad brjod do //
NK100(the)007:113: 'o na khyod kyis rdzogs pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di nyams na /
NK100(the)007:114: chos thams cad kyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur te /
NK100(the)007:115: shin tu yang dka' bas 'di bsrung nus sam byas la /
NK100(the)007:116: bsrung nus zer na 'di skad ces bya'o //
NK100(the)007:117: thams cad ma lus ye shes sangs rgyas la //
NK100(the)007:118: bsgrub cing bsrung par bya ba ye nas med //
NK100(the)007:119: bde dang mi bde ye nas gnyis med de //
NK100(the)007:120: nyon mongs sdug bsngal ye nas mnyam pa nyid //
NK100(the)007:121: nga med bdag med mnyam par khyed kyis bsrungs //
NK100(the)007:123: de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod do //
NK100(the)007:124: thog ma med pa'i yun ring 'khor ba 'di //
NK100(the)007:125: nyon mongs phyin ci log gis dbang du bsdus //
NK100(the)007:126: bdag 'dzin zhags pa dam por bcings //
NK100(the)007:127: na rgas 'chi sogs sdug bsngal ri bos non //
NK100(the)007:128: 'chi bdag srin pos rang dbang med par khrid //
NK100(the)007:129: shin tu 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal che bzod na //
NK100(the)007:130: mnyam nyid dam tshig bsrung bar cis mi nus zhes brjod de /
NK100(the)007:131: rtogs pa yod na rtogs pa dang mthun par spyod nus par kyang bgyid lags so //
NK100(the)007:133: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la rig pa rtsal gyi dbang /
NK100(the)007:136: ye shes spyi blugs kyi dbang spyin no //
NK100(the)007:137: der gdams ngag thos pa ni /
NK100(the)007:138: gdong g.yogs bkrol la dmig dbye' ba'o //
NK100(the)007:139: don rtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o //
NK100(the)007:140: rtogs te goms pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o //
NK100(the)007:141: zhes 'jug sgo zhib tu bshad do //
NK100(the)007:142: de nas slob mas bka' drin bzod pa'i phyir tshig 'di brjod do //
NK100(the)007:143: 'gro la phan mdzod thugs rje bla ma yin //
NK100(the)007:144: ye shes spyan gyis bdag la gzigs nas su //
NK100(the)007:145: thugs rjes lcags kyus 'khor ba'i 'dam nas drangs //
NK100(the)007:146: gnyis med rtogs pas ma rig mun pa bsal //
NK100(the)007:147: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab des //
NK100(the)007:148: 'gro drug mnar yang ma tshor da ngos zin //
NK100(the)007:149: bdag gi lus srog rdul du gtang yang ni //
NK100(the)007:150: yi dam bla ma khyed ni mi spong ngo //
NK100(the)007:152: zhal skyems dang zhal zas rnams sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la mchod /
NK100(the)007:153: bdag nyid kyi bla ma yang mchod /
NK100(the)007:154: gtor mas chos skyong bsrung ma rnams la mchod /
